name: Data Analyst
description:
AliExpress's main aim is to make it easy to do business everywhere, we are looking for the ones who are driven by these lifestyles, experienced in business development and lighted up with e-commerce.

Job Description:

  • Investigate the user behavior and build reports on the quality of the product;
  • Solve ad hoc tasks to support decision-making;
  • Analyze the success of the launches of new functionality;
  • Conduct A / B tests and interpret their results;
  • Identify problems that occur in users, and look for ways to solve them, validate hypotheses.

Requirements:

  • Ability to see the physical meaning behind numbers and find cause-and-effect relationships;
  • Know math well and know the basics of statistics (we will check);
  • Know SQL well and have used at least one programming language in your work.

It will be a plus:

  • Experience as a product analyst for 2 years or more;
  • Higher technical education.

What we offer:

  • Work for one of world's biggest IT companies in Russia;
  • Comfortable office in Moscow City with limitless fruits and coffee;
  • Competitive salary with performance-based bonuses;
  • Mac or Windows laptop of your choice;
  • Corporate medical insurance.
